requirement.topic: XmlBlaster provides a facility to record all message transfers with the possibility to play back this flow in slow/fast motion
requirement.description: The class InvocationRecorder can be plugged into a client or the server, to follow all CORBA method invocations with exact timestamp. Every invocation is stored and may be later played back.
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
